page.title: 02LOCAL AMENITIES -
page.content:
I live in Station Lane Hornchurch. There is a local parade of shops just down the road with a chemist, newsagents, two sweetshops and a car parts shop. There is a telephone box and a pillarbox just across the road and a local youth club at the school every Tuesday night.. I go swimming at Harrow Lodge Swimming Baths every Monday night. The town centre is quite near and the bus routes run down our road. We have a play park just round the corner and I go there every night. There's a church quite near and I go most Sundays. We have a station just down the road and a park called Harrow Lodge.
by Colin Bailey SANDERS DRAPER SCHOOL.
